name: Ext_R2_ElementDefinition_sl_discriminator
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ElementDefinition|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Element values that used to distinguish the slices
element.definition: Designates which child elements are used to discriminate between the slices when processing an instance. If one or more discriminators are provided, the value of the child elements in the instance data SHALL completely distinguish which slice the element in the resource matches based on the allowed values for those elements in each of the slices.
element.comment: `ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator` maps to R5 `ElementDefinition.slicing.discriminator`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
